line_1: STANHOPE has gain'd one branch of fame,
line_2: To which, I'll prove, he has no claim.

"When modest want can reach his view. "

line_1: "When modest want can reach his view. "

line_2: No man takes sweeter bribes than he.

line_1: The noble FULVIA spurns at gain:
line_2: Freely she heals her lover's pain:

line_1: Freely she heals her lover's pain:

line_1: But, surely, you'll allow me this,
line_2: That when she grants, she shares the bliss.

line_1: So STANHOPE, in each gen'rous action,
line_2: Reaps more than half the satisfaction.
